README.md.content:
# {{PROJECT_NAME}}

{{PROJECT_NAME}} - Basic MCP server for {{DOMAIN}} generated with MCP Bootstrap.

## üöÄ Installation

```bash
# Install dependencies
pnpm install

# Build project
pnpm run build

# Install globally
pnpm run install:global
```

## üîß Claude Desktop Configuration

Add to your `mcp.json`:

```json
{
	"mcpServers": {
		"{{KEBAB_CASE_NAME}}": {
			"command": "npx",
			"args": ["{{KEBAB_CASE_NAME}}"],
			"env": {
				"MCP_TRANSPORT": "stdio"
			}
		}
	}
}
```

## üõ†Ô∏è Available Tools

- **hello_world**: Sample greeting tool
- **get_info**: Get system information

## üß™ Development & Testing

```bash
# Development mode
pnpm run dev

# Test with MCP Inspector
pnpm run inspector

# Lint code
pnpm run lint
```

## üìÅ Project Structure

